授業目的: This course introduces students to the study of the environment of modern Japan by examining historical cases as well as contemporary issues.
到達目標: Students will gain a general understanding of the environment of modern Japan as well as common perspectives and analyses of environmental issues in the global context.

トピック.授業計画1: This course is largely made up of case studies related to modern Japan. The case studies will be selected to reflect students interests and current debates in and outside Japan.
トピック.授業外学習2: There will be weekly readings, a weekly short essay, and a weekly presentation for all students.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.

成績評価Grading2: プレゼンテーション・発表／Presentation (07)
成績評価Grading3: 授業への参加度（自発性、積極性、主体性、等）／In-class participation,contribution (09)
